subject: Curling
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Eve Muirhead, the leader of Britain’s women’s curling team, will enter the Sochi Games as a reigning world champion, but also as the focus of a newfound Olympic interest in Britain.
snippet: Eve Muirhead, the leader of Britain’s women’s curling team, will enter the Sochi Games as a reigning world champion, but also as the focus of a newfound Olympic interest in Britain.
